hotels.title: Lavish Niseko Suites in the Heart of Hirafu Village with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: In the heart of spectacular Hirafu Village, the ultra-modern Chatrium Niseko Japan offers a carefree and contemporary alpine stay, cradled by the soaring peaks of Mt Yotei and Mt Niseko Annupuri. This impressive hotel flaunts a blizzard of world-class dining facilities, including four impressive restaurants - ranging from Michelin-starred French-Japanese cuisine to Western favourites and tapas-style dining - and an onsite market, perfect for stocking up on trekking treats.
